summary.Title: We are looking for skilled Industrial Technicians for Southern, Western, and Central Jutland!
summary.JobHeadline: We are looking for skilled Industrial Technicians for Southern, Western, and Central Jutland!

JoblogWorkTime.DailyWorkTime: Dag, aften, nat, weekend, skiftende arbejdstider

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are looking for skilled Industrial Technicians for Southern, Western, and Central Jutland!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a qualified industrial technician ready for new challenges? We offer permanent positions with good working conditions and attractive salary opportunities!

With us, you can find work in areas such as Rødekro, Ribe, Vejen, Horsens, Esbjerg, Varde, Ølgod, Skjern, Tarm, and Lem. We collaborate with several companies in Southern Jutland, Western Jutland, and Central Jutland, which continuously need both newly qualified and experienced industrial technicians.

About the Jobs

As an industrial technician, your tasks will typically include:

  • Multiple setups and changeovers in production.

  • Adjusting and fine-tuning CNC programs.

  • Working with various types of machines and production technologies.

 

We offer flexible working hours, with options for:

  • 3-, 4-, or 5-day workweeks, depending on your distance to the workplace.

  • Rotating shifts on day, evening, or night shifts, as well as 12-hour shifts.

You will usually be offered 2-3 job interviews, allowing you to choose the company that best matches your preferences for work-life balance and salary package.

We are looking for someone who:

  • Is a qualified industrial technician – this is a non-negotiable requirement.

  • Has experience with setups and CNC adjustments.

  • Speaks Danish or is fluent in English.

  • Is quality-conscious, detail-oriented, and works well independently and in teams.

The more skilled you are, the better salary opportunities we can offer you!

Interested?

Send an email to pmi@thorncontractors.com to learn more, and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible!

Or click "Apply for Position" – and you will be contacted promptly.

We look forward to hearing from you!
